attributes.action: Stop remainers from trying to set new guidelines in referendum.
attributes.additional_details: Great Britain made the decision as a whole to go independently. Stop focusing your energy on hatred and blame and start working together to build this wonderful bright future that Great Britain have in this beautiful country.
attributes.background: The referendum was done and was counted, the leave camp won. It does not matter by how many, they did. Since then, petitions for a re-run, London calling to be its own state (thought they wanted to be in EU not America). Cyber bullying also, really. Face facts, leave won, move on, deal with it!
